h5.font: In order to ensure a safe operating environment for users of the Williams network, all computers are required to run the Safeconnect client. This client verifies that your computer has anti-virus software that is up to date and that your computer is set to receive critical operating system updates. It has the same function as the Windows Security center that comes with Windows XP, Vista and 7 but it will alert OIT staff when there is a computer that is not compliant. Computers without anti-virus and critical updates are at a much greater risk of becoming infected with malware.
Your computer is being evaluated for compliance with this policy. After a minute or so, please try to navigate away from this page.

font.p: When the initial File Download box comes up, please click "Open."

Netscape & FireFox users, please click "Save" and when the file finishes downloading,
click on the installer.
If you click "I DO NOT ACCEPT" you will not have internet access.
